creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: Spherical-shaped cup and lid with finial; decorative stem
text: Designed by Böres as a commission for a special occasion, likely a ceremonial function, this presention cup (pokal) is more an objet de vertu than a functional piece. Having begun as a jewelry designer, he continued to produce small scale metalwork complemented with intricate detail. The cup's surface is delicately hammered and the stem's rhythmic floral motif offers an arabesque counterpoint. The amethyst setting provides a quiet punctuation to the overall design.
title: Pokal (covered presentation cup)
